Macro: COMMON-LISP:WITH-STANDARD-IO-SYNTAX¶

Bind the reader and printer control variables to values that enable READ to reliably read the results of PRINT. These values are:

PACKAGE the COMMON-LISP-USER package PRINT-ARRAY T PRINT-BASE 10 PRINT-CASE :UPCASE PRINT-CIRCLE NIL PRINT-ESCAPE T PRINT-GENSYM T PRINT-LENGTH NIL PRINT-LEVEL NIL PRINT-LINES NIL PRINT-MISER-WIDTH NIL PRINT-PPRINT-DISPATCH the standard pprint dispatch table PRINT-PRETTY NIL PRINT-RADIX NIL PRINT-READABLY T PRINT-RIGHT-MARGIN NIL READ-BASE 10 READ-DEFAULT-FLOAT-FORMAT SINGLE-FLOAT READ-EVAL T READ-SUPPRESS NIL READTABLE the standard readtable SB-EXT:SUPPRESS-PRINT-ERRORS NIL SB-EXT:PRINT-VECTOR-LENGTH NIL

Lambda list¶

(&body sb-impl::body)
